content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Jun 2018Hi all, how does one goes about the tax-related matter when getting the returns/ dividends from Robo-Advisors? Do I need to include them when I am doing my tax filing (for any amount that I have got), or does the robo advisors does them?2 answersAnswerBump0
